title: Malted sultana bread
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) strong wholemeal (bread) flour, preferably stoneground', '150g (5½ oz) strong white (bread) flour', '½ tsp salt', '1 tsp easy-blend dried yeast', '3 tbsp malt extract', '1 tbsp clear honey', '200 ml (7 fl oz) tepid water', '85g (3 oz) sultanas']
